Information Retrieval On-Line .A Lancaster, F.W. This book deals with on-line systems for bibliographic search and retrieval.  The literature on this subject is increasing rapidly and new systems are appearing all the time.  We have attempted to provide a broad survey of the characteristics, capabilities, and limitations of present systems.  Our emphasis is on the design, evaluation, and use of on-line retrieval systems, primarily from the viewpoint of the planner and manager of information services.  It is oriented toward the "intellectual" aspects of information retrieval rather than the hardware or programming aspects.  We hope that this book may have some value for all students of library and information science. .X 10	1	459 18	3	459 61	1	459 114	1	459 120	1	459 123	1	459 124	2	459 127	4	459 128	1	459 129	2	459 135	1	459 145	3	459 169	1	459 175	1	459 190	3	459 191	2	459 197	1	459 211	1	459 214	1	459 218	1	459 225	1	459 243	1	459 244	2	459 245	1	459 274	1	459 289	1	459 291	1	459 304	1	459 305	1	459 306	1	459 307	1	459 312	1	459 320	1	459 321	1	459 330	1	459 345	1	459 357	2	459 358	1	459 376	3	459 378	1	459 385	1	459 394	1	459 400	1	459 433	1	459 450	1	459 451	1	459 452	1	459 458	1	459 459	31	459 468	1	459 475	1	459 484	1	459 492	1	459 493	1	459 505	1	459 508	1	459 511	1	459 512	1	459 514	2	459 518	1	459 520	1	459 523	1	459 524	2	459 525	2	459 526	2	459 527	1	459 529	2	459 530	2	459 532	1	459 534	3	459 546	2	459 548	1	459 553	1	459 575	1	459 579	2	459 594	3	459 598	1	459 599	1	459 602	1	459 603	1	459 604	1	459 606	2	459 609	1	459 610	1	459 611	2	459 612	2	459 621	1	459 625	3	459 626	2	459 627	1	459 630	2	459 633	1	459 635	1	459 636	2	459 637	2	459 642	3	459 643	1	459 646	3	459 648	2	459 650	1	459 692	2	459 696	1	459 699	1	459 702	3	459 703	2	459 705	1	459 708	1	459 726	1	459 727	1	459 728	2	459 730	2	459 731	2	459 732	3	459 733	2	459 734	3	459 736	3	459 738	1	459 739	1	459 740	2	459 741	1	459 742	3	459 743	2	459 744	1	459 754	1	459 755	1	459 814	1	459 817	1	459 820	2	459 823	1	459 825	1	459 826	7	459 827	4	459 828	1	459 877	1	459 879	4	459 883	3	459 885	2	459 925	1	459 947	1	459 948	1	459 972	1	459 990	1	459 1004	1	459 1017	1	459 1035	2	459 1045	1	459 1058	1	459 1073	1	459 1078	1	459 1080	1	459 1089	1	459 1091	1	459 1143	1	459 1146	2	459 1198	1	459 1207	1	459 1230	1	459 1257	1	459 1263	1	459 1264	1	459 1284	1	459 1297	1	459 1303	2	459 1327	1	459 1356	2	459 1357	1	459 1364	1	459 1368	3	459 1370	3	459 1372	3	459 1373	1	459 1374	4	459 1375	3	459 1376	2	459 1377	2	459 1383	1	459 1390	1	459 1392	1	459 1396	4	459 1402	1	459 1405	1	459 1414	1	459 1448	2	459 1448	2	459
